package.description:
Ipopt (Interior Point OPTimizer, pronounced eye-pea-Opt) is a software package for large-scale [nonlinear optimization](http://wiki.mcs.anl.gov/NEOS/index.php/Nonlinear_Programming_FAQ). It is designed to find (local) solutions of mathematical optimization problems. https://github.com/coin-or/Ipopt
nonlinear optimziation solver
active
c++
